title: May Day with the largest attendance in Sri Lanka’s history : No force will be allowed to rob Sri Lankans of their hard-won freedom and peace – President Mahinda Rajapaksa
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa said yesterday that no force will be allowed to deprive the country of the freedom and the peace enjoyed by the people of all communities, with the eradication of terrorism which plagued the country for over 30 years….
